caller_intent: The caller (Gary Alliance) aims to correct an insurance policy mismatch, ensuring the client's auto policy is with the same company as her homeowners policy to secure a bundling discount.
resolution_steps: Informed the client about processing a return for the Progressive auto premium.
Requested her to visit the office next week to sign paperwork for policy transfer.
Highlighted that the new premium would be slightly lower and include a homeowners discount.
Offered flexibility for her to visit during the following week.
summary: Gary Alliance resolves a policy mismatch for Miss Tribbett by arranging a return of her Progressive auto premium and transferring the policy to her homeowners carrier, securing a discount. He schedules a follow-up visit for paperwork and confirms the financial benefit of the change.
